data.title: Student data protection
data.desc: Unlike ChatGPT, Flint does not use student chat data to train AI models.

data.title: Equitable access
data.desc: Flint is accessible to students under the age of 13 with no phone number required.

data.title: A+ customer support
data.desc: Flint provides 1-1 onboarding calls for teachers, virtual trainings, and in-person PD.
